email_chain.subject: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I hope this email finds you well. I have a vessel available for a crude oil shipment from Houston to Rotterdam. The vessel is the MV Ocean Star, 150,000 DWT, 280m LOA. The laycan is 15-20 October. I can offer a freight rate in the low 50s (USD 50.50 per ton). Let me know if this works for you or if you need further details. Best regards, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the offer. The laycan works for us, but the freight rate is a bit high. We were hoping for something closer to USD 49.00 per ton. Can you check with the owner if they can adjust? Also, could you confirm the demurrage rate? Best, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I discussed your counteroffer with the owner. They are willing to come down to USD 49.75 per ton, which is their best offer. The demurrage rate is USD 25,000 per day pro rata. Let me know if this works for you. Cheers, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the update. USD 49.75 per ton is acceptable. However, we’d like to cap the demurrage at USD 20,000 per day. Can you confirm this with the owner? Also, please send over the full vessel details and laycan confirmation. Best, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, the owner has agreed to cap the demurrage at USD 20,000 per day. Attached are the full vessel details and laycan confirmation (15-20 October). Let me know if you need anything else to proceed. Best regards, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, everything looks good. Let’s proceed with the fixture at USD 49.75 per ton and demurrage capped at USD 20,000 per day. Please send over the recap for review. Thanks, John

email_chain.subject: Fixture Recap - Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, please find attached the fixture recap for your review. Let me know if any changes are needed. Looking forward to closing this deal. Best, Sarah
